activity_differential: young goat foraging and approaching adult goat
goats foraging together in grassy field
description: A young goat wearing a shirt is moving across a grassy area, gradually approaching an adult goat. The adult goat is stationary and appears to be grazing or foraging. The camera follows the young goat as it moves toward the adult goat, capturing their interactions.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: The goat is described as moving across the scene and grazing, which implies it is on the ground near the plant, not on top of it. It is physically implausible for the goat to be on top of a dense, bushy plant.
